Upon entering, he finds that the machine has been cleaned and oiled. This sequence of events shows the disappearance and subsequent discovery of the Time Machine, along with its altered condition.

   c. The relationship makes sense based on the book summary and chapter outline, as it follows the narrative of the Time Traveller's experiences with the Time Machine.

Since all atomic parts are grounded in the chapter outline and the relationship between them is valid and meaningful, the claim is consistent with the provided information.
